programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: Daniel tiene sueños en los que Sarah Gardner le pide que descifre una tablilla para encontrar la Ciudad Perdida de los Antiguos. Mientras, Carter empieza una relación con un detective, quien decide investigar sobre el verdadero trabajo de Sam.

programme.title: Entre fantasmas
programme.desc: Un chef de cocina murió quemado debido a un fuego producido en el restaurante chino del que era copropietario. Ahora, un año después de su muerte, busca a Melinda y le pide que sea ella la que localice a la persona que causó el fuego.

programme.title: Entre fantasmas
programme.desc: Melinda se encuentra con el camarero de un night club que, pese a su debilidad por la música, no ha podido tocar la guitarra desde que su amigo murió. Intrigada, la médium indaga en el caso y finalmente averigua que el camarero está poseído por dos fantasmas.

programme.title: Entre fantasmas
programme.desc: Melinda Gordon se enfrenta al complicado caso de un jugador de béisbol universitario poseído por un fantasma. Se trata del espíritu de una ex estrella del mismo equipo que ahora está muerto. A lo largo del episodio, el joven deportista pide ayuda a Melinda.

programme.title: Entre fantasmas
programme.desc: Melinda debe lidiar con fenómenos que se repiten constantemente en el laboratorio de botánica de la Universidad. Al observar que una planta traída de Perú está sangrando, pronto se da cuenta de que ha de enfrentarse al fantasma de un científico que murió en la selva.

programme.title: Entre fantasmas
programme.desc: Melinda se pone en contacto con el fantasma de un hombre que está en coma y todavía no ha traspasado al más allá. La mujer de este hombre se encuentra metida en una batalla legal contra sus padres para desconectarlo o no de la máquina que lo mantiene vivo.

programme.title: Wynonna Earp
programme.desc: Wynonna Earp ahora es la guardiana del Jardín del Edén y está tratando de buscar una forma de sacar de allí a Waverly y Doc, antes de que queden atrapados para siempre.

programme.title: La bella y la bestia
programme.desc: Tras el naufragio de sus navíos, un mercader arruinado debe exiliarse con sus hijos en los dominios mágicos de la bestia. Entre ellos se encuentra Bella, alegre, guapa y llena de encanto. Christophe Gans (''El pacto de los lobos'') dirige esta adaptación del cuento de hadas tradicional europeo, convertido en 1740 en relato escrito por la francesa Gabrielle-Suzanne ...

programme.title: Blancanieves y la leyenda del cazador
programme.desc: Versión oscura del cuento de los hermanos Grimm, en que Blancanieves debe enfrentarse a una reina malvada que quiere matarla. La monarca no contaba con que el cazador encargado de deshacerse de Blancanieves iba a enseñarle a defenderse. Esta producción, obra del realizador publicitario de televisión Rupert Sanders, consigue dar una vuelta de tuerca más al tradicion...

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter es un joven estudiante que vive con sus tíos y sufre el acoso del matón del instituto. Un día, mientras investiga el pasado de su padre, sufre la picadura de una araña radiactiva que le da superpoderes y le transforma en el Spiderman. Marc Webb se enfrenta a la difícil tarea de recuperar uno de los grandes héroes de cómic que han pasado por las salas reciente...

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter lleva una vida muy ocupada, compaginando su tiempo como Spider-Man, con en el instituto. Las cosas se le complicarán cuando aparezca un nuevo villano, Electro, y un viejo amigo, Harry Osborn. Tras el éxito de la saga ''Spider-Man'', de Sam Raimi, Marc Webb quiso volver a empezar la historia de nuevo, con nuevos actores protagonistas y su propio imaginario. Es...

programme.title: Un puente hacia Terabithia
programme.desc: Una tarde de verano, Jess y Leslie deciden adentrarse en el bosque. Algo increíble les está esperando. Cierran los ojos y abren la mente, y todo aquello que habían imaginado se hace realidad. Más allá del camino, más allá del río les espera un mundo mágico, fantástico y lleno de aventuras, les espera: Terabithia. La última película del director de fotografía Michae...

programme.title: Siete hermanas
programme.desc: Siete hermanas idénticas luchan por permanecer ocultas en un mundo superpoblado, donde se tiene que seguir la política de ''un hijo'' por familia y donde persiguen a todos aquellos que incumplen esta ley. programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: A crepe joint stacking them 21 high in butter-rum caramel cake; stuffed cabbage with kreplach; stout-braised lamb cheese steak.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.sub-title: Cook Like a Pro: Perfect Pastry

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.sub-title: Cook Like a Pro: Salads for Four Seasons
programme.desc: Ina Garten shares tips for sensational salads for every season; crispy mustard chicken salad; frisee salad; tarragon shrimp salad; faro tabbouleh with feta; tri-color salad with orange.

programme.title: The Kitchen
programme.desc: Kicking off summer with a hot menu; sizzling summer burgers; double potato salad with pesto; Bev Weidner thrills on the grill with grilled salmon tacos; chef Robert Irvine brings peach barbecue chicken; the hosts make stepped-up s'mores.

programme.title: Symon's Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael creates an entire Italian feast over coals on the grill, starting with fettuccine with smoked tomato sauce; Liz mixes up creamy ricotta, lemon and herbs for stuffed squash blossoms; lemon upside-down cake.

programme.title: Symon's Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon grills up several summertime staples; barbecue chicken slathered in a Kansas City-style sauce; pickles, mint leaves and poppy seed added to fresh coleslaw; Liz makes a Kentucky Mule cocktail.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond cooks food for her kid crew to take home after a busy day of filming; she makes Alex's veggie-packed burritos, Mauricio's tortilla soup, Paige's s'mores brownies and Stu's baked BBQ ribs.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree is busy working on a mom-made lunch for her father-daughter duo on the farm; her menu includes a classic cowboy quiche, Paige's favorite Italian salad, and some very green, cold and delicious honeydew melon gazpacho.

programme.title: The Kitchen
programme.desc: Jeff Mauro shares all the twists, turns and new takes on the hot dog and brings out his recipe for hot dog curly fries with dippers; guest chef Mary Giuliani also makes her Cacio e Pepe and Carbonara versions.

programme.title: Symon's Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: From a variation on his mother's pasticcio to Greek donuts with honey, Michael whips up a delicious meal, and his wife, Liz, joins in with a hazelnut frappe that pairs well with dessert.

programme.title: Guy's Ranch Kitchen
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's chef friends re-create some restaurant favorites; Eric Greenspan stirs a ruby red and tarragon paloma; Antonia Lofaso makes Vietnamese spring rolls; Marc Murphy prepares chicken and merguez tagine; Crista Luedtke grills chili tri-tip.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Things get zany in the kitchen when the king of dad jokes, actor and comedian Bob Saget, teams up with Anne Burrell to get the last laugh on Bobby; Philadelphia chef Aliza Green and North Carolina's Sam Diminich show Bobby the joke's on him.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: "The Kitchen" co-host Sunny Anderson and world traveler Andrew Zimmern join forces to beat chef Bobby Flay, handpicking Brooklyn's finest Jared Forman and Italian master chef Fabio Viviani to deliver the win.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: ``Chopped'' judges Geoffrey Zakarian and Amanda Freitag enlist Jimmy Buffett's private chef, Dante Giannini, and Telluride's Eliza Gavin to edge out the win and wipe out Bobby Flay.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: TV food stylist Jackie Rothong competes against Italian-born Matteo Boffo for the chance to go up against Bobby Flay; Scott Conant and Bethenny Frankel must decide who actually gets a shot at Bobby.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Author Daphne Oz and chef Damaris Phillips decide who has the skill to paint Bobby Flay out of the picture; chef and artist Enrique Limardo goes up against Southwestern chef Jeff Smedstad in an all-out culinary battle.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Culinary queen Martha Stewart returns with Iron Chef Michael Symon to beat Bobby Flay and they bring in two young guns, brunch queen Sarah Wade and sous chef Max Castro.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Chicago, a saucy spot mashes up Latin and Asian with a unique paella and posole; a comfort food joint in Seattle fires things up with Nashville hot chicken; a place in Kona, Hawaii, mixes island and mainland with guava ribs and tropical pizza.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.sub-title: Triple D Nation: Something For Everyone
programme.desc: Guy Fieri kicks it old school in Seattle as he pops into one of his favorite places from the first season to see what's new for breakfast and lunch; in Minneapolis, Cuban cuisine has taken off since the show came to visit.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: An Alameda, Calif., joint cooks Nashville hot-style chicken and puts a gourmet twist on a burger; in Lansing, Mich., chicken is served French-style at a funky pizza-pasta place; a Kona, Hawaii, spot blends Southern comfort with island flair.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri and his son, Hunter, chat via video with four DDD alums who guide them on a trip to Flavortown; a funky waffle from Syracuse, gourmet mac 'n' cheese from Cleveland, California smoked turkey and green chile pork with an island twist.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Smyrna, Ga., a doctor-turned-chef fires up amazing Asian from righteous ramen to Korean wings.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Nature's Great Events

programme.title: Nature's Great Events

programme.title: Nature's Great Events

programme.title: Nature's Great Events
programme.desc: The yearly flood of the Okavango Delta turns 4,000 square miles of arid plains into wetland.

programme.title: Nature's Great Events

programme.title: NASA's Unexplained Files

programme.desc: Security cameras in an underground parking garage capture an empty car starting and moving as if driven by a ghost. Experts investigate and discover a sinister threat that might put any vehicle at risk.

programme.desc: After Neil Armstrong's moonwalk, he led an expedition into the Amazon to find a legendary library that holds all knowledge of an advanced alien civilization. Experts ask if a close encounter on the moon's surface inspired Armstrong's mysterious quest.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: New evidence suggests that the mythological Scorpion King might have actually existed. New discoveries might answer this ancient mystery, and experts use modern-day tech to reveal more of Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Scientists have spent years looking for the mummy of Nefertiti, one of ancient Egypt's most iconic pharaohs. The latest tech helps experts in their search, what they discover might reveal the shocking truth about how she died, and Egypt\u2019s dark secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: New discoveries reveal if King Tut's tomb is indeed cursed, as it is said to have killed nine people. The latest science might finally answer this ancient mystery, and experts use modern-day tech to investigate more of Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Explorers in search of a lost city built by Ramses II uncover startling evidence that reveals the extent of ancient Egypt's scientific knowledge, and the new discoveries at this strange site offer more clues to Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: The Screaming Mummy is one of Egypt's greatest mysteries: a mummy with a terrifying expression frozen in agony. New discoveries reveal the connection between this horrific discovery and a pharaoh's murder, offering more clues to Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Cataclysmic changes in ancient Egypt might have been caused by an extraordinary set of international phenomena, and the latest tech helps identify the supernatural culprit. What experts discover reveals a truth stranger than fiction.

programme.title: Secrets of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Lost for centuries, scholars believe the Ark of the Covenant never left Jerusalem and remains buried beneath this ancient city. Now, a pioneering team of archaeologists is on a quest to unearth the most famous and treasured artifact in human history.

programme.title: Secrets of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Ancient documents and legends suggest that the Ark of the Covenant may have been stolen by Roman legions and hidden in Rome. Now, a team of archaeologists explore mystery cults and ancient catacombs to uncover the truth behind this treasured artifact.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.sub-title: Lost City of the Sumerian Gods

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: The decapitated statues of Mount Nemrut and their eventual destruction have mystified experts for centuries. Now archaeologists decode cryptic inscriptions and use innovative geophysical analysis to reveal the mystery behind this ancient megastructure.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: The Valley of the Queens is a vast necropolis concealing some of Egypt's most miraculous tombs and powerful women; now, investigators use cutting-edge tech to explore lost tunnels and uncover the enigmatic secrets behind these ancient pharaohs.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: The sprawling city of Persepolis was capital to the first imperial civilization that conquered most of the known ancient world; now, experts use advanced forensic archaeology to reveal the secrets behind Persia's mysterious and dominating metropolis.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: The Iceman is the world's oldest and most perfectly preserved mummy, and brand-new cutting-edge forensic technology is revealing his darkest secrets; these discoveries could change everything we know about the humans who lived 5,000 years ago.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: Scientists are using cutting edge technology to unearth a second city that, like the well-known city of Pompeii, was destroyed when Vesuvius erupted in 79 AD. This new town is revealed to be one of the most well-preserved Roman towns on earth.

programme.title: What on Earth?

programme.title: What on Earth?
